Title: Origin: Spirits of the Past
Director: Makoto Bessho, Kentarô Mizuno, Ken'ichi Shimizu
Writer: Umanosuke Iida, Nana Shiina, Naoko Kakimoto
Actors: Ryô Katsuji, Aoi Miyazaki, Yûko Kotegawa
Plot: It is 300 years into the future. Earth's environment had been devastated by mankind's own foolish plans and humankind is beleaguered by the sentient forests which they have awoken. The world balance is tipped when a young boy name...
